metadata.title: About Turboot - Thijs Herman
metadata.description: Learn more about Turboot, a sole proprietorship run by Thijs Herman. Specialized in web development, software development, and custom PC builds.

hero.title: About Turboot
hero.intro: Hello, I am Thijs Herman, the person behind Turboot. As an experienced developer and tech enthusiast, I help businesses realize their digital ambitions.
hero.description: With experience in software development and a passion for technology, I offer personal service and custom solutions that perfectly match your needs.

story.title: My Story
story.p1: At an early age, I was already very interested in computers. It started with gaming, which quickly grew into a passion for technology: from building PCs myself to setting up and managing my own servers. Here I learned to work with virtual machines (VMs) and containers, which laid the foundation for my technical knowledge.
story.p2: From that infrastructure background, my interest broadened to programming. I started building my own applications and discovered the power of software development. This combination of system knowledge and programming skills enables me to build complete, robust solutions.
story.p3: Nowadays, I use this experience to help clients with websites, software, and technical issues. For a complete overview of my professional experience and skills, you can also visit my

q1.question: What are your rates?
q1.answer: My rates depend on the type and complexity of the project. After our initial conversation, you will receive a transparent quote without hidden costs.

q2.question: How long does an average project take?
q2.answer: This varies greatly per project. A simple website can be ready within 2-3 weeks, while complex software projects can take several months.

q3.question: Do you also offer maintenance and support?
q3.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance contracts for all projects I develop. This ensures that your software remains up-to-date and secure.
